reasons_to_visit.details: Prague's Christmas markets are among Europe's most beautiful, featuring traditional crafts and mulled wine.
Snow-covered medieval architecture creates a magical fairy-tale atmosphere.
Festive decorations and Christmas spirit throughout the historic city center.
December builds to spectacular New Year's Eve celebrations and fireworks.
Perfect time for traditional Czech experiences in warm, atmospheric venues.

reasons_to_avoid.details: December temperatures often drop below freezing, requiring heavy winter clothing.
December attracts significant numbers of tourists for Christmas market visits.
Shortest days of the year with very limited sunshine hours.
Christmas and New Year's periods see increased prices for accommodations and dining.
